title: Spouted Bowl
period: Early Dynastic Period or Old Kingdom
description:
One spouted bowl of light blue Magnasite Marble. Ovoid in shape a grooved spout protrudes from its side. The lip is rounded and a small ring shaped base has been worked on the bottom. 
Condition: Good. Superficial cracking and some staining.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
